select count(*) from pg_tables where tablename = '_general' and schemaname = '_global'
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select id from _roles where name = 'Admin' and password = '5f4dcc3b5aa765d61d8327deb882cf99' limit 1;
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select c.relname as name, obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') as description from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_'  order by c.oid
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select count(*) from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_'

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'Post' limit 1
create table "Post" (id serial primary key ); grant select on table "Post" to anonymous; comment on table "Post" is 'Post'; comment on column "Post".id is 'ID';
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'Post' limit 1

select count(*) from pg_catalog.pg_attribute a where a.attnum > 0 and not a.attisdropped and a.attname <> 'id' and a.attrelid = (select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relname ='Post' and n.nspname = 'tester')

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'Post' limit 1

select a.attname as name from pg_catalog.pg_attribute a where a.attnum > 0 and not a.attisdropped and a.attname <> 'id'  and a.attrelid = (select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relname ='Post' and n.nspname = 'tester') order by a.attnum
alter table "Post" add column "id2" serial  ;comment on column "Post"."id2" is 'id2'
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'Post' limit 1

select count(*) from pg_catalog.pg_attribute a where a.attnum > 0 and not a.attisdropped and a.attname <> 'id' and a.attrelid = (select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relname ='Post' and n.nspname = 'tester')
